import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
print(S.count("ABC"))

n = int(input())
s = input()
count = 0
for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1
print(count)
